meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>take along</kanji> and <kanji>continue</kanji> something, you are creating a <vocabulary>serial</vocabulary> version of it. Come along now. Okay, continue! Come along now. Okay, continue! This is how Lord of the Rings was made, probably. Come along now.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
